text: Wise men, when in doubt whether to speak or to keep quiet, give themselves the benefit of the doubt, and remain silent.
author: Napoleon Hill

text: All men can see these tactics whereby I conquer, but what none can see is the strategy out of which victory is evolved.
author: Sun Tzu

text: The Supreme Court has ruled that they cannot have a nativity scene in Washington, D.C. This wasn't for any religious reasons. They couldn't find three wise men and a virgin.
author: Jay Leno

text: Beware, so long as you live, of judging men by their outward appearance.
author: Jean de La Fontaine

text: Great indebtedness does not make men grateful, but vengeful and if a little charity is not forgotten, it turns into a gnawing worm.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche
